segments.text: Why do you want to be a teacher ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a job I've been dreaming of since I was very little . I firmly believe that teaching is one of the most honorable jobs in the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In what department do you wish to work if we hire you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to work in the English Department , as I am an English major .
segments.speaker: S2
